Articles.Content: Hey everybody! KrisKolumbus here, brave new explorer venturing out across Kerbin, and soon, the whole Kerbalverse! Been playing the game for a while, loving every minute of it--maybe spending more time building ships and planes than actually *flying* them And now with .90 arriving, I finally decided to get a forum account. So! I just didn't want my first post to be "OMG something broke halp!" So here's me, saying hi to all of you, hoping for loads of Kerbal-tastic fun!
It's going excellently well, thank you! Busy at work, but other than that, things are great.
That's an awesome name, KristopherKerblumbus. Welcome to the forums!
